caption.title: List of prediction features with description.
caption.p: We used 32 mainly spatial and neighborhood specific features for the classification. Features are explained in the description column.

tr.td: Euclidean distance to the neuromast center
Number of divisions that the cell has undergone
Angle between current cell location, neuromast center and location of last cell division (or start of the movie in case of founder cell division)

Radial distance between current cell location and location of last cell division (or start of the movie in case of founder cell division). If the current location is nearer to the center the value is (+) in case it is further away the value is (-)
Euclidean distance between current cell location and last cell division (or start of the movie in case of founder cell division)
Radial distance of current cell location divided by the radial distance of the current furthest cell (to approximate the neuromast size)
Number of H cells in 10 µm radius
Number of H cells in 20 µm radius
Number of H cells in 30 µm radius
Number of M cells in 10 µm radius
Number of M cells in 20 µm radius
Number of M cells in 30 µm radius
Number of S cells in 10 µm radius
Number of S cells in 20 µm radius
Number of S cells in 30 µm radius
Polar angle is the counterclockwise angle between the x-axis, the neuromast center and the current cell location
Time to last division (or start of the movie in case of founder cell division)
